Get The Most Fun Impreza App

Simple, nice and user-friendly application of the weather. Only relevant and useful information.[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="invisible" size="small"][us_btn text="Download" link="url:%23download|||" color="secondary" size=""][us_btn text="Learn More" link="url:%23features|||" color="white" size=""][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][us_image_slider ids="2948,2623,2889" arrows="hide" nav="dots" autoplay="1" autoplay_period="3000" img_size="tnail-masonry" frame="phone6-2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="huge" el_id="features"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Key Features

Super Simple. Super Quick.

A lot of colors for the background, you can choose them yourself. Go to your phone's widgets and select the one you like.[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="invisible" size="large"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][us_counter target="162" suffix="k" color="primary" title="App Downloads" align="left"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][us_counter target="92" suffix="%" color="primary" title="Five Star Reviews" align="left"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][us_single_image image="2889" size="tnail-masonry" frame="phone6-1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="huge" color_scheme="secondary" el_id="screenshots"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Screenshots

How does the design of the app pages looks like. You are free to change the design

[/vc_column_text][us_separator type="invisible" size="large"][vc_row_inner columns_type="large"][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_single_image image="2888" size="tnail-masonry" align="center" frame="phone6-2"][vc_column_text]

Sunny Weather

When the weather sunny background changes to a warm orange color. Enjoy this wonderful weather until it ended.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_single_image image="2887" size="tnail-masonry" frame="phone6-2"][vc_column_text]

Rainy Weather

When the rain outside the window background changes to gray tones. Time to drink a cup of tea.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][us_single_image image="2889" size="tnail-masonry" frame="phone6-2"][vc_column_text]

Cloudy Weather

On the street warm, but clouds gathered. Let's hope that the rain will not go but prepare your umbrella.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="huge" el_id="reviews"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

What People are Saying

Impreza is the best fun app you will ever use. Don’t just take our word for it, see what everyone else is saying!

I could put six stars lol.[/us_testimonial][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][us_testimonial style="4" author="Mdanse" company="via the App Store"]I’m imprezzaed^^, your theme is one of the best I’ve seen. Automatic update is a pure delight. The support is also perfect. [/us_testimonial][us_separator type="invisible" size="large"][us_testimonial style="4" author="Bsesay" company="via the App Store"]A great theme with a strong team behind it. Really love it. I’ve bought twice and will buy again if needed… Thanks![/us_testimonial][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row height="huge" color_scheme="alternate" el_id="download"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

What are you waiting for?

Simple, nice and user-friendly application for this demo. Just download the app from the App Store.
